title: "Activities"

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
`%>%` = magrittr::`%>%`
print_activity_table = function(topic)
{
  paper_table = read.csv("activities/activities.csv") %>% 
    tibble::as.tibble() %>%
    dplyr::filter(project == topic) %>%
    dplyr::arrange(desc(year)) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(content = paste0(
      authors, 
      " <a href='",
      url,
      "' target='_blank'>",
      title,
      "</a>. ",
      journal, ". ", year, ".")) %>%
    dplyr::select(content)
  
  DT::datatable(paper_table,
                escape = FALSE,
                options = list(dom = 't'),
                rownames = FALSE,
                colnames = c(""))
}
```
